channel.title: [Pi] Multi Combat Icon Not Showing Up - Help!
channel.description:
Hello. When I walk into multi combat area's the multi combat icon (the two swords) doesn't show up at the bottom of the screen as it is suppose to. Doesn't anybody know how to fix this?
Thanks

item.title: [Pi] Multi Combat Icon Not Showing Up - Help!
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

They are. The zones work. The icon doesn’t show up is all.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] Multi Combat Icon Not Showing Up - Help!

item.title: [Pi] Multi Combat Icon Not Showing Up - Help!
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Make sure you have the correct layout.

Also if this place is for NPC multi make sure you put the coords in both player.java and npc.java.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] Multi Combat Icon Not Showing Up - Help!
